description:
For steep, modern technical routes and mixed lines, the La Sportiva Nepal Cube uses thermo-tech injection to bond layers and reduce stitching through the uppers. Honeycombed carbon in the midsole offers a stiff, light platform that aids precise footwork. Insulated throughout, these boots are a legitimate option for high altitude, high-angle mountain routes.

  • 3.2mm silicone-impregnated Idro-Perwanger leather upper with highly abrasion-resistant fabric and air-injected rubber rands
  • Board-lasted construction creates a stable, solid platform
  • Lined with a GORE-TEX® insulated comfort membrane for warm, waterproof-breathable protection
  • 3-D flex ankle and removable adjustable variable fit tongue enhance mobility and fit
  • Insole is Carbon Tech honeycomb that offers reliable stiffness with 4mm EVA foam for warmth and vibration dampening
  • Midsole uses 3mm polyurethane, graded for crampon attachment
  • Re-soleable Vibram® Matterhorn rubber with Impact Brake System
name: La Sportiva Nepal Cube Gore-Tex Mountaineering Boots - Men's
